data.name: League Space
data.detailed_description: League Space is a primarily first person "MULTIPLAYER" space shooter game. You will be able to move through the magnetic fields of the sphere and you will place yourself in a very large sphere with 2 starting bases. Each base has a maximum of 20 people, that is, 20 vs. 20. The game consists of taking down the entire enemy team and if a whole team is killed, the opposing team wins. It's a bit tricky at first, fun and entertaining. Of course you can shoot your team, you have to be careful with friendly fire.
data.about_the_game: League Space is a primarily first person "MULTIPLAYER" space shooter game. You will be able to move through the magnetic fields of the sphere and you will place yourself in a very large sphere with 2 starting bases. Each base has a maximum of 20 people, that is, 20 vs. 20. The game consists of taking down the entire enemy team and if a whole team is killed, the opposing team wins. It's a bit tricky at first, fun and entertaining. Of course you can shoot your team, you have to be careful with friendly fire.
data.short_description: The space league has started! It's time to prove yourself and bring victory to your team. Decide who you want to be on your team and win the war against aliens from other galaxies to stop the invasion in your world to end.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: i5 9th / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 / GT730 Zone Edition
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3720 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Simple
  • Additional Notes: We recomend have 4 GB of VRAM in minimum
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8th / Ryzen 7 4^
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 / GTX 1080 / RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3720 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Simple
  • Additional Notes: We recomend have 8 GB of VRAM in recomended
